author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
In Berlin's halls of power, a thawing doth transpire,
Zelensky seeks alliance, to Ukraine they aspire,
Once partners of the Russian vine, with Ænglish ale they swirl,
Arms and gold in wond'ring hands, they now to East unfurl.

To Thai lands, a youthful scion of a populist clan,
Pro-democracy brings hope, 'gainst milit'ry's stern hand,
Against Prayuth Chan-ocha, this batt'l doth commence,
A parliament uprising, for people in defense.

In tale of lone deserter, a Navy SEAL doth roam,
To war with Russian bear, instead of loyal home,
A journey strange and arduous, this sea-soldier now treads,
With courage and a wry jest, his tale through history spreads.

feedItems.title: Zelensky's Berlin Trip Heralds Thaw in Ukraine-Germany Ties
feedItems.description: Once a close partner of Russia, Germany has become Europe’s largest purveyor of weapons and money to Ukraine.

feedItems.title: Thai Pro-Democracy Parties Push to Break Military Grip
feedItems.description: A scion of a populist political dynasty is among those challenging Prime Minister Prayuth Chan-ocha in a national election.

feedItems.title: More »
feedItems.description: The Navy SEAL who abandoned his post and went to war with Russia

author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
Upon the Southern Border's edge,
Where migrants wait their fate,
In Mexico they make their pledge,
To claim asylum's gate.

In noble JPMorgan's name,
Accusations 'gainst them rise,
By statesmen of Republican fame,
In quest of faith's reprise.

A Codex grand in ages past,
Sent shivers down her spine,
The prize so vast, if won at last,
Shall worth all time define.

feedItems.title: Migrants Wait Along Southern Border as New Rules Go Into Effect
feedItems.description: Thousands of migrants along the border are deciding to stay in Mexico and request asylum appointments instead of entering the U.S. illegally.

feedItems.title: JPMorgan Targeted by Republican States Over Accusations of Religious Bias
feedItems.description: The nation’s largest bank is rebutting the claims of GOP attorneys general and treasurers, who say the bank mistreats people of faith.

feedItems.title: More »
feedItems.description: When she first laid eyes on the Codex Sassoon, she felt a tingle down her spine. It could soon be the most expensive document of all time.

author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
Oh hark, ye birds of twittered song,
In venturous strife the words withdrawn!
To ease the rancor or be lost,
Thus spoke the sage, the Musk, enthrall'd.

In lands of ancient creeds and cries,
Hath peace hath won 'gainst stormy skies,
Where cease the fiery storm-borne rains,
On Egypt's grace, the truce maintains.

The snails' lament of sizzling plight,
Of Western lands, infernal sight!
The heat doth rise like rabbit's flight,
'Neath sun-kissed dome, ne'er shadows nigh.

feedItems.title: Twitter Restricts Content in Turkey Ahead of Elections
feedItems.description: Elon Musk said in a tweet the social-media company had to choose between limiting access or being throttled completely.

feedItems.title: Israel, Palestinian Militants Agree to Cease-Fire After Five Days of Fighting
feedItems.description: Egypt and U.N. mediated the truce. At least 33 Palestinians were killed, Gaza officials say, while militants fired more than 1,200 rockets, Israel’s military says.

feedItems.title: Pacific Northwest Starts Sizzling Under Heat Dome
feedItems.description: More than 12 million people across the Pacific Northwest are under a weekend heat advisory as unseasonably high temperatures as high as the 90s take hold across the region.

author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
In lands of strife, a wyrm appears,
Four mighty drakes doth fall.
Kyiv thou art, with victory cheers,
New might their fate befall.

Pontiff of Rome, a word implores,
Zelensky seeks his stance.
Amidst the cries, of warrior roars,
For peace, the Norse beseech.

Biden and kin, debate the gold,
A limit o'er their debt,
Yellen, the wise, with words grown old,
Seeks calm and heath to set.

feedItems.title: Four Russian Military Aircraft Downed Near Border With Ukraine
feedItems.description: The strikes suggested Kyiv has gained new long-range capabilities, as Germany announced its biggest package of military equipment for Ukraine to date.

feedItems.title: Ukraine's Zelensky Asks Pope Francis to Condemn Russian Aggression
feedItems.description: The pontiff has offered to serve as an intermediary, but his refusal to explicitly condemn Russia’s invasion has raised skepticism in Ukraine.

feedItems.title: Republicans, Democrats Making Progress in Debt-Limit Talks, Yellen Says
feedItems.description: The Biden administration and congressional Republicans are making progress in their negotiations over federal spending and raising the debt limit, Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said.
